basics.name: Gaurav Dabli
basics.label: DevOps/Software Engineer
basics.summary: Gaurav is devops/software engineer. he loves building secure and falut tolerant cloud infrastracure to help clients to implement cloud based solutions to provide significant cost saving and speed to market. he is also experienced in automation using python. he loves to solve interesting techincal problems and see himself as a constant learner to achieve the same.

highlights: Responsible for developing cloud infrastructure (AWS) for global finance teams at capital one
Developed Python utility to find PCI data on S3 bucket
Automated run of BAU processes using python
Analysed databricks thoroughly(scalaibity, user interface, features and charges) comoparing it with Amazon EMR and helped it to roll out at enterpise level within capital one
Developed shell scripts to automate Cerebro installation on Legoland (contanier servies created internally by capital one)
Architected, designed and implemented automated rehydration for Zookeeper cluster using ansible  and python, used rolling update methedology to achieve the same
Wrote ansible playbooks to create and rehydrate EC2 instances and perform software installations such as anaconda, oracle, sql server, spark, Teradata
Implemented cloud fomartion temaplted with autoscaling groups based on certain threshold (CPU  usage greater then 75% ) to maintain Ec2 cluster in AWS
Created entire AWS environment as part of TREX in west region and helped developers to migrate process in west
Worked for DevOps platform team responsible for specialization areas related to chef and ansible  For cloud automation
Wrote cookbook for haproxy installation and configuration to load balance mesos cluster
Designed cookbook to configure mesos instances to transfer logs to single splunk server
Build APIs for entire zeno framework including Kafka, zookeeper, apache marathon and mesos to sent the status of individual instance on consul for monitoring
Provided AWS environment/infrastructure support for development team
Wrote python scripts to automate releases process
Developed chef cookbook to download tomcat server on EC2 instances
Familiarized with AWS services like EC2, S3 buckets, Cloud formation templates, cloud trail,  Auto scaling groups, virtual private cloud etc
Designed new database tables for Oracle DB as part of cross product dependency enhancements
Automation testing using selenium web driver
web development using javascript
bug fixes and enhancements

references.name: Mike Jackson, Director Data analytics, Capital One
Sujatha Selvan, Program Manager, Wipro Limited
